body_html:
Same issue here; for me, it seems to be related to #1045. When I set num_epochs to a value other than None in the file where I save the model, I will get the "'Tensor' object has no attribute 'initializer'" error in the file where I restore the model.

(TF 1.2, Python 3.6.1+)
body_text:
Same issue here; for me, it seems to be related to #1045. When I set num_epochs to a value other than None in the file where I save the model, I will get the "'Tensor' object has no attribute 'initializer'" error in the file where I restore the model.
(TF 1.2, Python 3.6.1+)
body:
Same issue here; for me, it seems to be related to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1045. When I set num_epochs to a value other than None in the file where I save the model, I will get the "'Tensor' object has no attribute 'initializer'" error in the file where I restore the model.

(TF 1.2, Python 3.6.1+)
